# Fall 2019

Welcome to EMSE 6574: Programming for Analytics. This is a separate section from the graduate-level section. In this section, we will be using the [R computing language](https://www.r-project.org/) to learn how to read, write, and debug code and produce comprehendable and reproducible analyses. 

Click on the [Syllabus](syllabus.html) page for details about the class requirements, learning objectives, and schedule.
